#summary A taxonomy of software packages containing large sparse linear system solvers.

= Linear Solvers =

  * [http://code.google.com/p/pyamg/ pyamg] - algebraic multigrid solvers in python. Authors: Nathan Bell, Luke Olson, Jacob Schroder.
  * [http://homepages.ulb.ac.be/~ynotay/AGMG/ AGMG] - Iterative solution with AGgregation-based algebraic MultiGrid. Author: Y. Notay, A. Napov.
  * [http://www.mathworks.com/help/techdoc/ref/mldivide.html MATLAB's backslash operator]. Author: Mathworks. Proprietary.
